projects.name: Autodialer
projects.description: A scalable, efficient outbound calling system built with ReactJS, Python, and FastAPI. Designed to handle high call volumes with features like call scheduling, analytics, and real-time status updates.
features: Real-time call analytics and status updates

projects.name: Smart City (Desktop Application)
projects.description: An intuitive Java-based desktop application for streamlined urban management. It integrates modules like traffic monitoring, public services, and resource allocation to simplify city operations.

projects.name: ATM Banking
projects.description: A secure Java application simulating ATM functions like withdrawals, deposits, and balance inquiries. Focused on user-friendly interaction and robust security measures.
features: Core ATM operations like withdrawals and deposits

projects.name: Institute Management
projects.description: A ReactJS and Elasticsearch-based platform for managing student and staff data, providing seamless data retrieval and management capabilities.
features: Role-based access for staff and admin users

projects.name: Atithi Agman
projects.description: A ReactJS and MySQL platform for managing guest arrivals and food arrangements. Designed for efficiency in tracking and planning guest-related activities.

projects.name: Kwix.Live
projects.description: A ReactJS and Elasticsearch platform aimed at simplifying student and staff data management. Built for high performance and real-time updates.
features: Advanced Elasticsearch integration for fast retrieval

projects.name: Resume Maker
projects.description: A Java application to generate professional resumes based on user input. Includes multiple templates and options for dynamic customization.
features: Template selection for different resume styles
Dynamic customization of sections and layout
Export options for PDF and Word formats

projects.name: Bank Management System
projects.description: A Java-based application for automating banking operations like account management and transaction tracking. Ensures accuracy and security in financial processes.

projects.name: Marksheet Generator
projects.description: A tool for generating academic marksheets and reports. Automates grade calculation and provides printable, well-structured outputs.
features: Export options for printing and records
